summary: Changes a number of items, all of them listed.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=2]WezEllison\'s[/size] [/color][color=Green][size=2]Less[/size][/color] [color=Red][size=2]Annoying Items[/size][/color]

[color=Yellow][size=2]Modders make these to make the game more enjoyable for you, I don\'t ask for money but if you like what you see please Endorse to show your appreciation, thankyou.[/size][/color]


[color=Green][size=3]Why have you done this?[/size][/color]
The idea behind this was I wanted lighter leather & dragonbones and had always found it annoying that the Blacksmith\'s potions were ony 30 seconds, which forces you to try and rush to get your items upgraded.
Some of you will say \"why not just download the mods you need of nexus and save time?\" It\'s a good question, the reason was I didn\'t want to have multiple .esp files when I could have just one that does everything I want.

[color=Yellow][size=2]If there\'s an item you want to see on the list, feel free to leave a comment & I\'ll add it if I see it being a reasonable request, I will change it to a weight/duration I think is suitable and wouldn\'t be game breaking.[/size][/color]


[color=Green][size=2]CLUTTER[/size][/color]
Dwemer Bowl - Original Weight was 2 - Weight is now 1
Dwemer Cog - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 5
Firewood - Original Weight was 6 - Weight is now 3
   

[color=Green][size=2]POTIONS[/size][/color]
Blacksmith\'s Elixir - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds
Blacksmith\'s Philter - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds
Blacksmith\'s Potion - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds 
Blacksmith\'s Draught - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds
Potion of Haggling - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds
Draught of Haggling - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds
Philter of Haggling - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds
Elixir of Haggling - Duration was 30 Seconds - Duration is now 60 Seconds 


[color=Green][size=2]ITEMS[/size][/color]
Pickaxe - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 2.5 
Notched Pickaxe - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 2.5 
Rockspinter - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 2.5 
Woodcutters Axe - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 2.5 
Poachers Axe - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 2.5 


[color=Green][size=2]MISCELLANEOUS[/size][/color]
Glenmoril Witch Head - Original Weight was 4 - Weight is now 2 
Hammer - Original Weight was 3 - Weight is now 1  
Shovel - Original Weight was 4 - Weight is now 2 
Unusual Gem - Original Weight was 0.5 - Weight is now 0.1 
Skeleton Key - Original Weight was 0.5 - Weight is now 0
Shards of Mehrunes\' Razor - Original Weight was 6 - Weight is now 3
Linen Wrap - Original Weight was 3 - Weight is now 1 
Dragon Bone - Original Weight was 15 - Weight is now 5
Dragon Scale - Original Weight was 10 - Weight is now 5 
Leather - Original Weight was 2 - Weight is now 0.5


[color=green]STAND ALONE GERMAN VERSION - Requested by Sondra1408[/color]
Firewood - Feuerholz - 2  
Leather - Leder - 0.5 
Linen Wrap - Leinentuch - 1 
Quill - Schreibfeder - 0 
Dragonbone - Drachenknochen - 7.5 
Dragonscale - Drachenschuppen - 5 
Woodcutters axe - Holzf√§lleraxt - 5 
Pickaxe - Spitzhacke - 5 



[color=Green][size=2]INSTALLATION[/size][/color]
Pretty much the same procedure as anything else, drop the .esp in your folder in your Skyrim directory and activate it within the Data files on your Launcher.

[color=Yellow][size=2]I highly recommend BOSS - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6[/size][/color]


[color=Red][size=2]INCOMPATABILITIES[/size][/color]
You\'ve got common sense, if the file you\'re using is editing the same parameters I\'ve edited in this .esp then it most likely wont work, you could try it however but I will not be responsible if you break your game.
author: WezEllison
